doc.field: Independent Association of Publishers' Employees Records
Independent Association of Publishers' Employees Records

Series contains approximately 1400 photographs of demonstrations, conferences, dinners, formal events, as well as portraits and documentary photographs, involving the Independent Association of Publishers' Employees (IAPE) and the Communications Workers of America (CWA) from 1986 until circa 2000. Consists mostly of 4x6 black-and-white and color snapshots with corresponding negatives distributed throughout approximately 47 envelopes, as well as over 100 8x10 portraits and candid documentary photographs of IAPE members.
The series also includes nine buttons featuring IAPE, CWA, and IAPE-CWA insignia.
Independent Association of Publishers' Employees Records
